alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 08 at 3:15PM HST until March 12 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS UNTIL 12 AM HST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE HALEAKALA SUMMIT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... .Strong and gusty winds will continue for lower elevations across the state through midnight tonight before diminishing during the early morning hours on Thursday. Dangerously strong winds will affect the higher elevations on the Big Island and Haleakala. The winds will be particularly long lasting over the Big Island summits. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 70 to 90 mph with higher gusts. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
